typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		OrderDetails as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select o.SalesOrderID, (select SalesOrderID, SalesOrderDetailID, ProductId, UnitPrice, OrderQty from SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail od where od.SalesOrderID = o.SalesOrderId for json auto)\n as OrderDetails from saleslt.SalesOrderHeader o',
	format: 'query') ~> orderheader
source(output(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		SalesOrderDetailID as integer,
		OrderQty as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		UnitPriceDiscount as decimal(19,4),
		LineTotal as decimal(38,6),
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> orderdetails
DerivedColumn2, orderdetails join(orderheader@SalesOrderID == orderdetails@SalesOrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive(orders = @(orderid=orderheader@SalesOrderID,
		orderdate=OrderDate,
		address=ShipToAddressID,
		orderdetails=@(unitprice=UnitPrice,
		quantity=OrderQty))) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select1 aggregate(groupBy(SalesOrderNumber = SalesOrderNumber),
	each(match(name != 'SalesOrderNumber'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		orders,
		SalesOrderID = orderheader@SalesOrderID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		Status,
		SalesOrderNumber,
		ShipToAddressID,
		SubTotal,
		TaxAmt,
		TotalDue,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		LineTotal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
orderheader derive(parsed = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumn2
